db.ti: Room Attendant/ CL - Nhân Viên Vệ Sinh Phòng/ Thời Vụ

more.description:
Be responsible for keeping guestrooms and the surrounding area in clean, orderly and well-maintained condition.
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES 1. To report defects, unusual guest behaviour, sickness and any damage found in guestroom. 2. To report and hand over lost and found articles to Floor Supervisor or Housekeeping office. 3. To count soiled linen and store clean linen in floor pantry. 4. To maintain cleanliness in floor pantry and back areas. 5. To maintain cleanliness of trolleys and ensure that adequate supplies are maintained. 6. To report suspicious persons loitering on guest corridors. 7. To move furniture from one room to another, from rooms to maintenance rooms and vice versa. 9. To render personal assistance to guest such as taking out food trays, shoe polishing, etc. 10. To check mini-bar and refill daily consumption following the proper procedures. 11. To inform fused light bulbs in guestrooms. 12. To remove all room service trolleys or trays from corridors and guest rooms automatically. 13. To attend to guest requests immediately. 14. To deliver and collect guest laundry. 15. To perform other duties as assigned by the superior. 16. To maintain the cleanliness and tidiness of guest corridors, lift landing, lift doors and ashurns are up to standard. 17. To tidy up the vacant rooms and make sure it is ready for guest arrival.
Day Shift 1. To make up dirty rooms and general cleaning. 2. To clean both the bedroom and bathroom. 3. To change used bed linen daily. 4. To vacuum room carpet daily. 5. To change used bathroom towels daily. 6. To report mini-bar consumption daily to the HK Clerk for record. 7. To refill guestroom supplies and mini-bar daily. 8. To pay special attention to VIP rooms. 9. To clean and stock maid trolley at the end of the shift. 10. To maintain and clean all equipment at the end of the shift. 11. To check and report to superior if any discrepancy found regarding room status. 12. To perform other duties as assigned by the superior. 13. To hand-over with the next shift and use maid logbook for daily communication as needed.
more.benefit: Free laundry for staff uniforms, free duty meals, medical benefits and other benefits as and when may be provided by the Hotel.
